summary: Data/QA professional (2+ yrs) skilled in Python, SQL, Power BI/Tableau, and QA automation. Combines data integrity, testing rigor, and product thinking to deliver reliable, insight‑driven experiences.

bullets: Resolved 500+ support tickets; analyzed issue trends to improve response time.
Maintained and updated AI chatbot knowledge base to improve answer accuracy.
Tracked repairs, software installs, and network data to identify recurring issues.
Facilitated labs on Python/OOP; provided debugging support and grading.
Mentored students from scripting fundamentals to problem‑solving patterns.
Executed functional/regression testing for a healthcare analytics platform.
Collaborated with engineering to refine workflows and surface critical bugs.
Led Cypress‑based automation; increased test coverage by ~40%.
Designed 100+ reusable test cases; improved regression efficiency.
Reduced customer‑reported defects by >25% through QA process improvements.
Performed API testing (Postman) and load testing (JMeter).
Executed regression & performance tests for fintech web apps.
Contributed to early automation scripts, defect triage, and security testing.
